Products.ProductDescription:
Badass Series : MRT KR Axle-Back #91A152
Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT KR Axle-Back #91A152 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    • Fits 2012 - 2013 Boss 302
    Fits 2011 - 2019 Mustang GT convertible and coupe
    Fits 2011 and 2012 Mustang Shelby GT500
    Does not fit 2013 and 2014 Mustang Shelby GT500

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Drivers come in all shapes, sizes and styles. Shouldn't a headrest adjust so that all Mustang enthusiasts can drive in comfort and style? Team MRT thought so! This headrest fits 2005 - 2009 Mustangs and allows drivers to select from four distinct rest positions. You'll enjoy your Mustang without a sore neck and without settling for a bizarre or unfinished look in your interior.

Our headrests are sold as a pair. The set includes one driver and one passenger headrest.

The headrest you see pictured above is Charcoal Black.

Products.ProductDescription:
**** This is a non-refundable, custom order item. Ships directly from the manufacturer in 6-8 weeks.****
Shouldn't a headrest adjust so that all Mustang enthusiasts can drive in comfort and style? Team MRT thought so! This Adjustable Tilting Headrest fits 2010 - 2014 Mustangs and allows drivers to select from four tilting positions and four height positions. The vinyl headrest delivers Ford factory-caliber fit and finish by matching the color, grain and stitching of your Mustang's interior leather upholstery. You'll enjoy your Mustang without a sore neck while keeping a polished, from-the-factory look in your interior.

The Adjustable Tilting Headrests are sold as a pair, including one driver and one passenger headrest.

See the drop down for complete headrest options.

Our matching recommendations:
Standard Premium Vinyl Rough Grain, White Stitching
Premier Trim Vinyl Smooth Grain, White Stitching
California Special Package Charcoal Smooth Grain, Black Stitching

Products.ProductDescription:
Give your vehicle interior a premium performance look with the MRT Predator Interior Package for 2010 - 2014 Ford Mustang. Offering unique style and quality craftsmanship, the Predator Interior upgrade includes custom seat covers, door panel inserts and console lid cover. Matching adjustable headrests are available as an option. Upholstery black, rough grain leather with black diamond stitch pattern accents. This product is made in the USA.

The predator interior kit includes:
(2) optional adjustable headrests with four tilt positions
(4) seat covers
(1) console lid cover
(2) door panel inserts

Note: Interior kit does NOT come with pony stitching seen in photos.

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2014 Mustang MRT Aluminum Rear Window Louvers
Products.ProductDescription:
The MRT team engineered the 2005 - 2014 Mustang Rear Window Louver to offer OE-caliber fit and finish. The rounded louver slats are free of rivets and protruding hardware. In addition, the curvature of the louver closely follows the Mustang's rear window glass. The MRT Mustang Rear Window Louver has a patented one piece, aircraft-grade aluminum design that ensures the louver is both lightweight and durable. With its high-quality, satin black powder-coat finish, it's ready to install right out of the box!

During installation, the Rear Window Louver by MRT requires no sheet metal drilling or other modifications to your Mustang. A Louver Hardware Kit is included and will provide you with the instructions and materials you need. Also included with the MRT Rear Window Louver is a Louver Prop Rod Kit. The kit allows you to prop up the louver on its hinges--making cleaning the rear window a quick, painless, one person job.

MRT Rear Window Louvers are made and engineered in America. They fit 2005 - 2014 Ford Mustangs, and are also available in a variety of custom painted finishes. Please contact us at 734-455-5807 for more information on custom painted Rear Window Louvers.

Products.ProductFeatures:
Team MRT engineered the new Camaro louver to be functional and durable, while maintaining a sleek design that you and your Camaro will love. The MRT Rear Window Louver completes the natural lines of the 2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro without compromising the Camaro's rear window visibility. The curvature of each louver is designed to produce a tight, flowing look and an arc that complements the Camaro's rear window. In addition, each Camaro louver features a smooth, seamless surface, free of distracting rivets and protruding hardware. The MRT Rear Window Louver for the 2010-2015 Camaro is sure to give your Camaro a legendary bad-boy look.

The MRT Rear Window Louver comes powder-coated satin black and ready to install. The Camaro louver may be painted to your taste, but the powder-coated black finish will look presentable on your 2010-2015 Camaro as-is. The MRT Camaro louver a one piece all-aluminum design that is lightweight and durable. It is hinged to allow you to easily lift the Camaro louver for cleaning. The included MRT Prop Rod Kit makes handling the Camaro louver a one-person job. The MRT Camaro Rear Window Louver requires no sheet metal drilling or modifications to your Camaro during installation of the louver. A Camaro Louver Hardware Kit is included, and we will provide you with the louver instructions and materials you need. MRT Camaro louvers are made and engineered in America.

These Louvers are also available in a variety of custom painted finishes. Please contact us at 734-455-5807 for more information on custom painted Rear Window Louvers.

The Rear Window Louver for the 1994-04 Mustang is simply the best louver on the market. It features a one piece, aircraft-grade aluminum construction, making the louver lightweight and durable. With the high quality, satin black powder-coat finish, MRT Rear Window Louvers are ready to install right out of the box! No sheet metal drilling or other modifications to your Mustang are required for installation.

Products.ProductName: 2010 - 2012 Mustang GT, Boss 302 MRT Front Splitter
Products.ProductDescription:
MRT Front Splitter: Track-inspired function and style. Featuring tough ABS plastic construction, MRT made this piece to last. It's grained to create a rugged appearance that's packed with attitude. Pure Stainless Steel turnbuckles resist rust and secure the Splitter to your Mustang's front fascia for an authentic finish. The MRT Front Splitter requires no paint. We kept precise fit and stunning impact in mind as we engineered the Front Splitter. We wanted our product to be "smart," so that it's as convenient as possible for you to install on your Mustang. Here's what we came up with:

The MRT Front Splitter fits 2012 Boss 302 and 2010-2012 California Special Mustangs with no pieces being necessary for purchase. The 2010 - 2012 Mustang GT front fascia can be adapted to accommodate the MRT Front Splitter. The GT model requires the MRT GT Conversion Kit. Installation varies slightly depending on your Mustang's model. Boss 302 Mustangs benefit from a direct fit that requires no drilling. Simply snap in and go! The California Special lower grille insert does require holes to be drilled into it before installing the Splitter. MRT provides a template for locating the holes on the California Special lower grille insert. 2010 - 2012 GT Mustangs require the purchase of an Conversion Piece that adapts the GT front fascia to the shape of the MRT Front Splitter. This Conversion Piece is a direct replacement for your factory fascia.

At the beginning of the design process, we set out with a lofty goal: make the best possible Splitter for 2010-2012 Mustang on the after-market. We believe we've accomplished this. It's aggressive and aerodynamic. Coming from MRT's team of experienced engineers, you know it'll fit and it'll last. Like all MRT products, the Splitter is Made and Engineered in America. So enjoy, and please don't hesitate to contact our specialists with questions.

Products.ProductDescription:
Review Pictures For Custom Shift Knob Options and Feature Codes

Add a sharp, custom look to your Ford Mustang with an MRT Shift Knob.This shift knob comes with a standard 16mm master thread and a reducer to fit your vehicle. The shift knobs come in two different sizes 2" or 2-1/4" knob diameters . The knobs will fit most vehicle applications with the proper reducer and hardware. MRT shift knobs are manufactured in America out of the finest Partek resin material. It ensures a lasting, high-gloss finish. A brass thread insert prevents frustrating stripped threads during installation. Our alignment jam-nut lets you set the shift knob to the height and position that you want. Best of all, these knobs are designed to resist changes in temperature: they won't freeze your hand in winter or fry it in the summer!

Engravings will be on both sides of the shift knob.

Embedments will be on the front of the shift knob (When installed facing the passengers).

Please Allow 2-4 Weeks For Each Custom Shift Ball To be Completed

If you do not see your shift pattern or shifter handle thread size available or have inquiries about custom colors embedments or engravings please contact MRT at (734)-455-5807

NOTE: PLEASE SELECT YOUR OPTIONS FROM THE DROP DOWN MENUS BEFORE ADDING THIS PRODUCT TO YOUR CART. EACH SHIFT BALL IS CUSTOM MADE TO ORDER PER YOUR SELECTION , NO REFUNDS WILL BE PERMITTED FOR INCORRECT ORDERS.

Products.ProductName: 2010 - 2014 Mustang MRT Tow Hook and Mounting Bracket
Products.ProductDescription:
MRT understands when you are out on the open road or track it is best to be prepared for whatever the road throws at you. Therefore, if you find yourself stuck in mud, or off track, the MRT tow hook and mounting bracket will provide extra security for tow trucks to get you out of a jam. This attachment can help you save money and avoid cosmetic or mechanical damage by providing a better option for towing instead of suspension pieces or bumpers.

Aside from acting as a secure place to attach a winch or tow strap to get you unstuck, we think that tow hooks also add a nice aesthetic touch that will set your vehicle apart from the rest. Paint it to match your car or leave it contrasting to give a more aggressive look; it will turn heads either way. These mounting brackets are easy to install (included tow hook ) and we recommend never leaving home without a pair, especially before a big race.

Kit includes:
1/8 x 30" x 1 1/2 plate
1/8 x 24" x 4" Plate

Applicable to 2010 - 2014 Mustang all models

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80D000
Products.ProductDescription:
MRT Hood Struts for 1994-2004 Mustangs eliminate the need for the factory hood prop rod and give you a clean and functional "performance look." Our No-Drill Hood Struts give show Mustangs an impressive look that sets them apart from the crowd, without giving them a permanent handicap. Your Mustang deserves better than to have holes drilled into its hood. The MRT Hood Strut Kit reuses OEM factory attachment points. They are very easy to install -- all you'll need is a 10mm wrench. Unlike other available kits, MRT Hood Struts require absolutely NO DRILLING and no extra bolts during installation. Simply bolt the kit on and go! Team MRT engineered and manufactured the MRT Hood Strut Kits for 1994-2004 Mustangs in the United States. We designed these Hood Struts to work with the factory hood. If you have an aftermarket hood, our tech team may be able to assist you in the adjustment process or provide you with a higher or lower pressure gas strut.

Please contact us at (734) 455-5807 for more information. Struts in the kit are finished in black. Brackets are made out of high-quality steel for utmost durability. They come standard with a quality Black PowderCoat Finish. MRT can also paint your brackets in any paint color. Please provide a paint code when ordering. There is an $40 fee for this service and does require a 1-2 week lead time. Please contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 if you have any questions about these custom finishes. MRT Hood Struts are rigorously engineered by Team MRT in Plymouth, MI. MRT Hood Struts are Made-in-America.

NOTE: THE MRT HOOD STRUTS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK WITH STOCK OEM HOOD. AFTERMARKET HOODS MAY REQUIRE DIFFERENT CYLINDERS. THE WEIGHT OF THE AFTERMARKET HOOD WILL BE REQUIRED TO SUPPLY YOU WITH THE APPROPRIATE CYLINDERS. PLEASE CONTACT MRT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

Street Performance Series : MRT Interceptor Axle-Back #91A103
Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Interceptor Axle-Back #91A103 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    3.5" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

  • Does it require a tune?

Product Quality

    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.

    All necessary hardware included.

Refined Sound with Just the right Attitude

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT MaxFlow H-Pipe : No Cats #93B001 has a refined, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?

    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.

    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2009 Mustang GT APR Rear Diffuser Fiber-Reinforced Plastic
Products.ProductDescription:
Add the finishing touch to your Mustang's exterior by dressing it up with a Fiberglass Rear Diffuser from APR Performance. This piece is exotic-looking, race-inspired, and unmatched in quality. In addition to offering a stylish racing look, the APR Mustang Rear Diffuser offers functionality that will boost your performance on track day.

This diffuser improves handling and grip by producing downforce with its aerodynamic design. In order to minimize turbulence and drag, the diffuser smoothly and efficiently directs high speed air flow from the lower pressure area underneath the car to the higher pressure region of the surrounding environment.

The APR Fiber Glass Rear Diffuser fits 2005-2009 Ford Mustang GT
Products.ProductDescriptionShort:
APR Performance

Styling Upgrade

MRT Part #12A201

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2009 Mustang GT APR Carbon Fiber Front Air Dam
Products.ProductDescription:
It is common to see new sports cars designed with items such as factory undertrays and other advanced aerodynamic components to produce "zero-lift". Although these components are great at reducing lift, they may not bring the added stability and traction road racers are looking for when taking fast turns.

This Carbon Fiber Front Air Dam goes beyond reducing lift and increases stability & downforce at high speeds. Aside from the performance benefits, the Front Air Dam also adds an aggressive yet functional appearance to a sports car. These carbon fiber front air dams are formed in the autoclave at high temperatures using pre-preg manufacturing processes.

Factory Fit Mounting Design; Front Air Dam utilizes existing factory mounting locations for an OEM fit.
Products.ProductDescriptionShort:
APR Performance

Styling Upgrade

MRT Part #12A204

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2009 Mustang APR Carbon Fiber Rear Diffuser
Products.ProductDescription:
Diffusers work in conjunction with other aerodynamic components of a car to help produce downforce. Because a car displaces air as it moves forward, the air molecules in the rear of the car get disrupted causing a vacuum of low pressure air.

To help channel the high speed air flow coming from underneath the car, diffusers redirects the high speed air flow to transition smoothly transition into the low pressure vacuum in the rear. This encourages a smoother flowing air flow underneath the car and allows better performance from other aerodynamic components such as aerodynamic wings.

Products.ProductDescription: <inline style="font-size: 16px;">To combat the effects of front end lift, these Front Wind Splitters are utilized to give extra traction and control in the front of a car. By creating a high pressure area on top of the wind splitter, high pressure air flow is restricted to flow underneath a car. With low pressure below the car, the effect of lift is reduced and a driver can gain from the extra traction and control.</inline>

Products.ProductName: 2007 - 2009 Mustang Shelby GT500 APR Widebody Aerodynamic Kit
Products.ProductDescription:
The GT-R Widebody aerodynamic Kit for the S197 Mustang gives an aggressive look while enhancing the smooth and subtle lines. This 10 piece kit helps to improve overall handling and traction. This aerodynamic kit increases the front stance by +45mm per front fender and +50mm per rear fender.

It allows installation of massive front wheel sizes of 20x9.5 with 285/30/20 profile tires and rear wheel sizes of 20x 12.5 with 345/25/20 profile tires. To enhance stability, the Mustang Widebody Aerodynamic Kit includes a carbon fiber front wind splitter that is designed as a front undertray. The optional 70 (1,778mm) GTC-500 Mustang Spec adjustable rear wing adds downforce on the rear wheels to increase rear-end stability.

This package includes:
- Widebody Front Bumper
- Carbon Fiber Wind Splitter/Undertray
- Widebody Front Fenders (45mm)
- Widebody Side Skirt
- Widebody Rear Fenders and Gas Door (50mm)
- Widebody Rear Bumper

Products.ProductDescription: APR Side Rocker Extensions are the next step to help aerodynamically tune the handling of a car. Made of lightweight and durable carbon fiber composites, APR Side Rocker Extensions help reduce lift at high speeds by preventing air at the sides of the car from rolling underneath the car. The reduced lift helps to stabilize the car during high-speed cornering and helps to increase traction for faster lap times.

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2009 Mustang APR Carbon Fiber Radiator Cooling Plate
Products.ProductDescription:
The flow of air is not only limited to the outside of a car. To maximize cooling capabilities, a radiator needs a direct flow of air to allow an engine to maintain consistent temperatures on the race track. Because of structural gaps above the radiator, the flow of air could escape making the radiator not as efficient as it could be.

To help improve the flow of air into the radiator, APR Carbon Fiber Radiator Cooling Plates can be utilized to channel the flow of air directly to the radiator. This will improve the efficiency of the radiator while adding a high-tech, race inspired look to your engine bay.

Pre-preg. Carbon Fiber Manufacturing Process Designed for Easy Installation Fade Resistant Epoxy Coating

Products.ProductFeatures:
NOTE: DOES NOT FIT 2011 - 2014 Ford F150 3.5L Eco-Boost (See part 73P006)
In minutes, dial in a custom boost setting for your Ford vehicle equipped 3.5L EcoBoost engine with the JMS boost control module. Installation is truly plug and play. Just disconnect your stock MAP, TIP and Pedal connector, then plug in your new JMS Boost control module tuning device. Once you've installed the system, you'll benefit from reduced turbo lag, improved acceleration, and increased low to mid-range horsepower and torque. JMS provides an estimated 5 PSI of extra boost.

Some customers have even reported an estimated gain of up to 2 MPG with normal use. The BoostMAX systems easy-to-use interface provides system status information and diagnostics at a glance. The included Remote Boost Adjustment Knob allows you to fine tune your boost setting and add up to 5 PSI. For maximum performance, this JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer can be stacked with the JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancer and a custom tune.

The JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer will work on 2011 -17 Ford models with 3.5L EcoBoost engines.

Each BoostMAX Kit Contains: BoostMAX Boost Enhancer, Plug & Play Wiring Harness, Remote Boost Control Knob, Installation Kit, Set of Instructions.

Products.ProductFeatures:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits 2011-2017 Ford and Lincoln vehicles.

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Ford vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitor, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

Optional remote adjustment knob used to dial in your exact throttle enhancement setting.

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80A012
Products.ProductDescription:
The Original No-Drill MRT Hood Struts for 2005-2014 Ford Mustangs. These aftermarket Mustang hood struts eliminate the factory hood prop rod and give you the clean, pleasing appearance every engine compartment deserves. MRT Hood Struts are great for both show and street Mustangs - don't let that hood prop distract from all the power you've packed under the hood. MRT joined design teams to develop NO DRILL hood struts for your 2005-2014 Mustang. MRT's Mustang hood struts have since become one of MRT's bestselling products.

The consistent customer satisfaction we have observed in response to our hood struts confirms their quality design. MRT Hood struts reuse OEM factory attachment points (Direct bolt on) and require NO holes drilled anywhere. These hood struts are easy to install on your Mustang - the only tool required is a 10mm wrench. These are designed to function with the OE weighted hood. If you have an aftermarket hood, please call us at 734-455-5807 and we can discuss further options. Struts in the kit are finished in black. Brackets are made out of high-quality steel for utmost durability.

They come standard with a quality Black PowderCoat Finish. MRT can also paint your brackets in any paint color. Please allow a 1-2 week lead time for this special order product. There is an $40 fee for this service. Please contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 to order a custom color not shown here.

NOTE: THE MRT HOOD STRUTS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK WITH STOCK OEM HOOD. AFTERMARKET HOODS MAY REQUIRE DIFFERENT CYLINDERS. THE WEIGHT OF THE AFTERMARKET HOOD WILL BE REQUIRED TO SUPPLY YOU WITH THE APPROPRIATE CYLINDERS. PLEASE CONTACT MRT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80C000
Products.ProductDescription:
The MRT Hood Struts eliminate the need for the factory hood prop rod and provide a clean and functional "performance look". They are the first No-Drill Hood Struts for Fox Mustangs on the after-market. Your Mustang deserves better than to have holes drilled into its hood. Get an impressive show-car look without giving your car a permanent handicap. How? The MRT Fox Mustang Hood Struts reuse OEM factory attachment points. They're very easy to install and require only a 7/16 wrench. Absolutely no holes and no extra bolts are required during installation. Simply bolt the kit on and go!

Team MRT engineered and manufactures the MRT Hood Strut Kit for 1979-1993 Mustangs in the United States. We designed these Hood Struts to work with the factory hood. If you have an aftermarket hood, our tech team may be able to assist you in the adjustment process or provide you with a higher or lower pressure gas strut. Please contact us at (734) 455-5807 for more information. Struts in the kit are finished in black. Brackets are made out of high-quality steel for utmost durability. They come standard with a quality Black PowderCoat Finish. MRT can also paint your brackets in any paint color. Please provide a paint code when ordering. There is an $40 fee for this service and does require a 1-2 week lead time.

NOTE: THE MRT HOOD STRUTS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK WITH STOCK OEM HOOD. AFTERMARKET HOODS MAY REQUIRE DIFFERENT CYLINDERS. THE WEIGHT OF THE AFTERMARKET HOOD WILL BE REQUIRED TO SUPPLY YOU WITH THE APPROPRIATE CYLINDERS. PLEASE CONTACT MRT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

International Aero, one of the largest and most well-respected private jet detailers in the world, is pleased to announce the creation of its new company, International AERO Products. AERO's new line of car care products, originally formulated to protect custom jet aircraft in the most extreme environments on the planet, pamper your vehicle inside and out - from the highest quality spray-and-wipe detailer to leather conditioner, glass cleaner, spray wax and more.</inline>

Products.ProductName: 2012 - 2015 Camaro V6 Ultra High Flow Catalytic Converter Assembly
Products.ProductDescription:
Sport Touring Series : Camaro V6 Ultra High Flow Catalytic Converter Assembly #90N181
Refined Sound with Just the right Attitude

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The Camaro V6 Ultra High Flow Catalytic Converter Assembly #90N181 adds a great sound with about 15% to 20% more sound than stock cats.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    200 cell highflow cat converters provide maximum exhaust gas flow. At 6.0L per side with a total of 12.0L of cleaning ability, these converters exceed performance specs.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    3/8 thick front flange tubing, O2 bungs, and welds are stainless steel.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    No Tips.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    No Tips.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    • Fits all 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015 Camaro LFX V6

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductFeatures:
Installing Your New Catalytic Converter

1. There are four (4) oxygen sensors (two per side) in your Camaro converters. Find and unplug each of the four (4) sensors. Unplugging these sensors can be a bit tricky. Some patience is required.

2. Unbolt the converter to manifold connection using a 15mm socket. You have to unbolt these from the engine compartment as the bolts are facing upwards.
Note: Make sure you undo the top bolts (CAT to MANIFOLD) first. If you undo the bottom first and then the top, the cat will fall and possibly break or damage the O2 sensors.

Note: This upward positioning of the bolts will be repeated when installing the SOLO cats. This is necessary to have access to the O2 sensor directly beneath these bolts.

3. Undo the bottom bolts using a 15mm socket. Carefully remove the converter.

4. Carefully remove the oxygen sensors from the stock converter with a 22ml or 7/8 wrench or special O2 socket.

5. Take great care not to mix up the O2 positions. They have to be put back in the same position from where they were taken.

6. Install the new SOLO Cats. The cats are market with a R (Passenger side) and L (Drivers side).

7. Sequence at Cat to Manifold connection from underneath the car:
Bolt facing upwards
Flat washer
Car
Solo gasket *Provided (Please be careful with the edges as they can be sharp.)
Manifold
Flat washer
Lock washer
Nut

8. Use the stock GM band clamps at the rear converter connection.

9. Finger tighten all bolts and manipulate the cat into alignment.

10. At this time the SOLO CATS should be sitting in place with the O2 sensors still removed.

11. Snug and then tighten all 8 bolts. Do this in an even manner. The front bolts can be either tightened from the bottom or top with a 9/16 socket.

12. Screw the front oxygen sensors into the O2 bungs on the SOLO FREE-FLOW CATS until very snug.

13. Screw the two (2) O2 extenders into the rear O2 ports of your converter until very snug. Screw the two (2) rear O2 sensors into the extenders until snug.

14. Plug in all four (4) O2 sensors into the wiring harness.

15. Check all connections and O2s to ensure they are tight and plugged in.

16. Check for rattles and tip alignment.

17. Drive away and Enjoy Going Solo!

Product Quality

Refined Sound with just the right Attitude

Hear the Difference

  • Add a deep, muscle car performance sound to your Camaro SS

Feel the Performance

  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • 2.5" diameter exhaust tubing reduces exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains

Get Noticed

  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the Black Ops Edition

  • Fits ALL trim packages
  • No tune required

Products.ProductDescription:
Street Performance Series : MRT MaxFlow Cat-Back #92B204
Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT MaxFlow Cat-Back #92B204 has a aggressive, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finsish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003 and 2004
    Mustang GT, Bullitt, and Mach 1 with 4.6L V8 and solid rear axle.
  • What doesn't it fit?
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductName: 1979 - 2019 Mustang MRT Special Edition Bullitt Shift Knob
Products.ProductDescription:
Finish off the tough, clean performance look of your Bullitt Mustang with a sharp, custom shift knob from MRT. The Bullitt Shift Knob a "riveted" satin trim and embedment featuring "Bullitt" and your very own Bullitt vehicle number. This shift knob comes with a standard 12mm thread and 2-1/4" knob diameter. Available in Highland Green or Solid Black colors. The knob will fit 2001 and 2008-09 Bullitt Mustangs without modifications. MRT shift knobs are manufactured in America out of the finest Partek resin material. It ensures a lasting, high-gloss finish. A brass thread insert prevents frustrating stripped threads during installation. Our alignment jam-nut lets you set the shift knob to the height and position that you want. Best of all, these knobs are designed to resist changes in temperature: they won't freeze your hand in winter or fry it in the summer! Please be sure to indicate your vehicle year and Bullitt vehicle number when ordering. This is a special ordered product, therefore it may take 4-6 weeks for delivery. Ford Mustang Fits 2001 and 2008-2009 Bullitt Mustangs Bullitt design w/your vehicle's number embedded Available in Highland Green or Solid Black Standard 12mm thread 2-1/4" knob diameter Resin material with lasting glossy finish Brass thread insert included Alignment jam nut included Made in America 4-6 weeks for delivery.

PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR BULLITT NUMBER IN THE ORDER NOTES.

NOTE: PLEASE SELECT YOUR OPTIONS FROM THE DROP DOWN MENUS BEFORE ADDING THIS PRODUCT TO YOUR CART. EACH SHIFT BALL IS CUSTOM MADE TO ORDER PER YOUR SELECTION , NO REFUNDS WILL BE PERMITTED FOR INCORRECT ORDERS.

Products.ProductName: 2008 - 2014 Dodge Challenger Roto-Fab Hemi Air Intake System
Products.ProductDescription: Increase HP & torque without sacrificing Fuel economy with the Roto-Fab Cold Air Intake system . This system is designed to maintain a barrier between the filter and harmful engine and radiator heat. The bottom of the air box is formed and cut for coupling to the stock air inlet hole. We have a triangular inlet on the outboard side of the air box that draws cooler air from the same area as the bottom opening; resulting in a larger volume of cooler air when you need it. Black anodized aluminum brackets mount to existing locations on your vehicle. No modifications are required for installation. Our custom molded air box coupler attaches to the air box with 6 stainless steel 10-32 screws. From start to finish, Roto-fab has designed and built this air intake with all of the qualities to make it work!
Products.ProductDescriptionShort:
• Dodge Challenger 5.7L Hemi 2008+
  • Blocks Engine Heat from Filter
  • No Calibration Required
  • Easy, Bolt-On Installation

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2010 Dodge Challenger 5.7L Cold Air Kit by Cold Air Inductions
Products.ProductDescription:
Maximize the performance of your Dodge Challenger with this high-performance cold air intake system from Cold Air Inductions, Inc. This CAI system delivers superior quality and craftsmanship, while achieving outstanding performance gains. CAI, Inc. estimates an average increase of 16 rear wheel horsepower, 14 ft-lb of torque, and up to 4 MPG in fuel economy on an otherwise stock V8 Challenger. This premium cold air induction kit is a direct replacement for the OEM air box. There's no need for additional modifications to your Challenger during installation. An aftermarket tune is NOT required to reap the performance benefits of this air intake. CAI, Inc. makes this premium cold air intake in the USA.

System fits 2005-2010 Dodge Challengers with 5.7L and 6.1L V8 engines. Available in Standard and Black PowderCoat Finishes.

Products.ProductFeatures:
Enhance your 2012-2015 Camaro ZL1's performance by upgrading to a high-performance Roto-Fab Cold Air Induction system. The Roto-Fab Camaro Cold Air Intake a new air box design, MAF housing and inlet elbow unique to the ZL1. System is designed to work well with the stock calibration, but is also accommodates aftermarket power-adders you may have installed. No modifications to your Camaro or its components are required for installation of this CAI kit. In addition, no tuning required! Oil filters come pre-oiled and ready to use. The filter requires 56 grams of oil when serviced. Roto-Fab makes their Cold Air Intake for the ZL1 Camaro in the USA.

Cold Air Intake Kit includes:
- Plastic tube
- Silicone hoses
- Air box
- Oiled air filter

Products.ProductName: Ford Vehicles with MAF SCT BIG AIR Mass Air Flow Meter
Products.ProductDescription:
The SCT Big Air Mass Airflow Slot Style Sensor is great for modified and custom tuned applications where the stock mass air meter "pegs" due to increased air flow. SCT's Big Air MAF Meter features OEM quality calibration for factory level drivability, repeated accuracy, and reliability. This MAF sensor supports centrifugal superchargers that range in the 425-600 HP range and Root Style Superchargers from 400-700 HP.

The SCT Big Air Mass Airflow Slot Style Sensor will provide increased performance on the 2000-2004 Ford Lightning and the 2003-2004 SVT Cobra. *Also may be installed on any Ford vehicle requiring a larger MAF.

* some fabrication may be required.

Badass Series : MRT QuadFlow Cat-Back : DMS #92S000
Loud, Aggressive, Take No Prisoners!

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT QuadFlow Cat-Back : DMS #92S000 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    3.5" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    T304 Stainless Steel : Polished Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Quad Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2014, 2015, 2016 and 2017
    Chevy SS.

  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductName: 2014 - 2015 Chevy SS Roto-Fab Cold Air Intake w/ Black Texture Finish
Products.ProductDescription: Many vendors have found sealing an induction system from engine bay heat to be quite difficult on the new Chevy SS. Not Roto-fab, they've taken the time to ensure you get the most out of your CAI by sealing off the top of the induction box, forcing true cold air in from behind the bumper. With gains upwards of 11rwhp, and plenty of added throttle response, you won't be disappointed with this upgrade. The install can be completed in under an hour with simple hand tools, and doesn't require a new PCM calibration, so you can get right back on the road. Roto-fab Cold Air Induction systems come with a pre-oiled, washable, conical air filter for maximum performance. This induction comes with a black texture finish, but is also available in Carbon Fiber for that classy performance look under your hood.

Products.ProductNameShort: 2010-15 Camaro SS Cold Air Intake by Roto-Fab
Products.METATAG_Keywords: Camaro CAI, Camaro SS cold air intake, Camaro cold air intake, Cold air intake for camaro
Products.ProductFeatures:
Enhance your 2010-2015 SS Camaros performance by upgrading to a high-performance Roto-Fab Cold Air Induction system. The Roto-Fab Camaro Cold Air Intake incorporates an air box custom-made to keep engine and radiator heat away from your filter. The molded air box adapter tube incorporates the mass air flow (MAF) sensor. Installation of this Roto-Fab CAI kit is easy, using factory mounting points. No tuning is required for installation. Oil filters come pre-oiled and ready to use. The filter requires 56 grams of oil when serviced. Roto-Fab makes their Cold Air Intake for 2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro in the USA.

Cold Air Intake Kit includes:
- Plastic tube
- Silicone hoses
- Air box
- Oiled air filter
- All necessary hardware

Products.ProductFeatures:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits most 2008-2015 General Motors vehicles, including the 2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro. (See Features section for complete list of applications.)

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Camaro or General Motors vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration. The optional dial allows you to adjust your throttle response from stock (0%) to all out race mode (100%) in a matter of seconds.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitors, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80U900
Products.ProductDescription:
Don't let your factory prop rod distract from all that power you've packed under the hood. Give your engine bay a clean, custom look with MRT Hood Struts for the 2015-2017 Ford Mustang, featuring the Original, "No Drill" design.
Unlike other Hood Strut Kits in the aftermarket, the MRT Kit requires NO DRILLING for installation, meaning no holes drilled ANYWHERE. MRT Hood Struts easily install in 15 minutes or less from start to finish. The only tools required are a ratchet with 10 mm and 13 mm sockets. Because MRT designed this kit for the 2015-17 Mustang, there are no extra modifications to the vehicle. Components simply bolt on at OEM factory mounting locations.

Gas Cylinders in all MRT kits feature a black powder-coat finish. Several finish options are available for the Hood Strut Brackets. The standard bracket finish is a satin black powder-coat. To give your Mustang a personalized touch, upgrade to one of our many custom paint options. Select your custom paint option above or contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 to order. Please allow a 1-2 week lead time for custom painted brackets.

NOTE: THE MRT HOOD STRUTS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK WITH STOCK OEM HOOD. AFTERMARKET HOODS MAY REQUIRE DIFFERENT CYLINDERS. THE WEIGHT OF THE AFTERMARKET HOOD WILL BE REQUIRED TO SUPPLY YOU WITH THE APPROPRIATE CYLINDERS. PLEASE CONTACT MRT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

NOTE: 2015-2016 ROUSH EDITION Mustangs will require an upgraded strut. Please contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 prior to placing your order.

Products.ProductDescription:
Street Performance Series : MRT Interceptor TurboBack : No Cats #98U900
Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Interceptor TurboBack : No Cats #98U900 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 3" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2015, 2016, 2014, 2018 and 2019
    Mustang EcoBoost.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    GT, GT500, Bullitt.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductFeatures:
By adding the JMS BoostMAX Controller to your new 2.3L Ford EcoBoost vehicle, you will benefit from improved vehicle acceleration, as well as increased low and mid-range horsepower and torque. Add up to 5 PSI* via the Remote Boost Adjustment Knob. Dial in your exact boost setting and adjust it on the fly. The JMS BoostMAX module can also reduce the problem of noticeable turbo lag on EcoBoost engines. Customers report 2+ MPG gains in fuel economy when their vehicles are driven normally.

This JMS Boost Enhancer is a true "Plug and Play" upgrade. No cutting or splicing of wires is required, and all necessary hardware is included with the kit. This system installs in minutes. Unplug your stock MAP, TIP and Pedal Connect, and then connect JMS BoostMAX.

JMS BoostMAX Controllers can be combined with SCT Handheld Tuners and JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancers for additional performance gains. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits of this product.

Products.ProductFeatures:
Reach higher performance levels with your Camaro SS by coupling your setup with a performance cold air intake from Cold Air Inductions, Inc. These cold air intakes offer superior quality and craftsmanship, in addition to achieving outstanding performance gains. On average, consumers gain 19 RWHP and 20 ft-lb of torque with installation of the CAI, inc. cold air intake system on an otherwise stock 2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro SS. Consumers can also benefit from up to 3 MPG in fuel economy. This is a direct replacement for the OEM air box. The kit retains the OEM washer bottle in the stock location. No tune is required for installation. CAI, Inc. proudly makes their Cold Air Intake system in the USA. Available in Textured Black, Near Chrome finishes, and NOW INTRODUCING custom paint and hydrographic options! That's right, break away from a standard underhood appearance and get your CAI painted to match your car, or have hydrographics applied for a carbon fiber appearance.

Call for more information, or to order a custom finished Cold Air Intake.

Cold Air Intake System includes:
- Aluminum insulated air box
- Removable air box with filter inspection window
- Thermal coated, billet MAF housing / intake tube
- High performance, lifetime-use oiled air filter
- Black silicone coupler / stainless clamps
- Custom finishes available

Products.ProductName: 2014 - 2018 C7 Corvette Stingray Abbes Design Body Kit
Products.ProductDescription:
Abbes Design set out with the goal of producing a timeless Aero Package which blends in with the C7's factory styling, and they have done just that. The Abbes C7 Corvette body kit compliments the OE body lines so well, those who weren't familiar with the vehicles factory aesthetics could easily assume that GM just took a more aggressive look right from the factory. All of the components from this kit are made from a two part Poly Rim. Each component from this body kit had to go through the rigorous German Tuev and testing which is uncontested as being the most difficult automotive testing process in the world. As an added bonus, Abbes designed this kit to use all of the OE mounting locations, so there is no additional modifications that need to be made to achieve precise fitment.

This kit includes:
2 Piece Front Splitter
2 Front Fender Accents (lh&rh)
2 Side Skirts (lh&rh)
1 Rear Diffusor
2 Piece Rear Spoiler (including base plate)
2 Rear Quarter Panel Inserts (lh&rh)

Products.ProductDescription:
NOTE: FITS ONLY 2011 - 2014 Ford F150 3.5L EcoBoost (For other 3.5L EcoBoost applications, see part 73P000)

In minutes, dial in a custom boost setting for your Ford F150 with 3.5L EcoBoost engine with the JMS boost control module. Installation is truly plug and play. Just disconnect your stock MAP, TIP and Pedal connector, then plug in your new JMS Boost control module tuning device. Once you've installed the system, you'll benefit from reduced turbo lag, improved acceleration, and increased low to mid-range horsepower and torque. JMS provides an estimated 5 PSI of extra boost.

Some customers have even reported an estimated gain of up to 2 MPG with normal use. The BoostMAX systems easy-to-use interface provides system status information and diagnostics at a glance. The included Remote Boost Adjustment Knob allows you to fine tune your boost setting and add up to 5 PSI. For maximum performance, this JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer can be stacked with the JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancer and a custom tune.

The JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer will work on 2015-2016 Ford F150 models with 3.5L EcoBoost engines.

Each BoostMAX Kit Contains: BoostMAX Boost Enhancer, Plug & Play Wiring Harness, Remote Boost Control Knob, Installation Kit, Set of Instructions.

Products.ProductDescription:
Badass Series : MRT Hellion Cat-Back #92P110
Loud, Aggressive, Take No Prisoners!

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Hellion Cat-Back #92P110 has an aggressive, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2012 - 2018 Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT &SRT8, 6.4L V8 Engine types
  • What doesn't it fit?
    Other Grand Cherokee Models
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Street Performance Series : MRT Interceptor Cat-Back #98U906
Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Interceptor Cat-Back #98U906 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 3" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2015, 2016, 2014, 2018 and 2019
    Mustang EcoBoost.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    GT, GT500, Bullitt.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductFeatures: Download Installation Instructions

Products.ProductDescription:
Performance 400 cell catalytic converter with 2.5" inlet and outlet without neck.

Here are suggested steps for a proper break-in or warm-up:

  • Start engine but do not touch the accelerator pedal.
  • Idle the engine and allow it to warm up slowly.
  • After 5 minutes, increase the engine speed to 2500 RPM.
  • Hold at 2500 RPM for 2 minutes.
  • Allow engine to cool down.
  • Road test vehicle to confirm correct installation.

Products.ProductFeatures:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits some 2012-2016 General Motors vehicles, including the 2014-2016 Chevrolet Corvette C7, 2014-2016 SS Sports Sedan and 2016+ Camaro. (See Features section for complete list of applications.)

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Camaro or General Motors vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitor, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

This JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller fits the following vehicles:
2014-2016 Chevrolet Corvette C7, 2014-2016 Chevrolet SS Sport Sedan, 2012-2016 Cadillac ATS (AWD & RWD), 2016+ Camaro

Products.ProductName: 1979 - 1993 Fox Mustang MRT Fascia Mounting Hardware
Products.ProductDescription:
From the factory, the original bumper mounting hardware included small studs with a flimsy piece of steel that often bent. MRT has developed a sturdier replacement solution, our 1973 - 1993 Fox Mustang Fascia Mounting Kit. These mounting brackets replace your factory brackets and improve on the quality of the original pieces. Using a thicker gauge steel and longer studs for the brackets makes them more durable and easier to install.

The kit includes five brackets total. Two brackets are used to mount the front bumper to the front fender panels. The rear bumper uses the remaining three: the smaller brackets connect the rear bumper to the rear quarter panels, while the longer bracket runs the length of the rear bumper.

Products.ProductDescription:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits 2005 - 2010 Ford vehicles, including 2005 - 2010 Mustangs. (See Features section for complete list of applications.)

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Ford vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration. The included dial allows you to adjust your throttle response from stock (0%) to all out race mode (100%) in a matter of seconds.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitors, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.
Products.ProductDescriptionShort:
JMS Chip

Performance Upgrade

MRT Part #73A900
Shop Now

Products.ProductName: 2014 - 2018 C7 Corvette Stingray Abbes Design Front Fender Attachments
Products.ProductDescription:
Abbes Design set out with the goal of producing a timeless Aero Package which blends in with the C7's factory styling, and they have done just that. The Abbes C7 Corvette compliments the OE body lines so well, those who weren't familiar with the vehicles factory aesthetics could easily assume that GM just took a more aggressive look right from the factory. All of the components from this kit are made from a two part Poly Rim. Each component from this body kit had to go through the rigorous German Tuev and testing which is uncontested as being the most difficult automotive testing process in the world. As an added bonus, Abbes designed this kit to use all of the OE mounting locations, so there is no additional modifications that need to be made to achieve precise fitment.

These Fender Attachments are featured in the new C7 Stingray Corvette complete body kit. They come standard unpainted, however they can be ordered either painted or with a carbon fiber overlay for a more aggressive appearance.
Products.ProductDescriptionShort:
Abbes

Styling Upgrade

MRT Part #12U100
Shop Now

Products.ProductName: 2008 - 2014 Subaru WRX, WRX STI Sedan MRT Cat-Back Performance Exhaust System
Products.ProductDescription:
2008 - 2014 3rd Generation Subaru WRX and WRX STI Sedan Cat-Back Performance Exhaust System
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 6 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 8.5 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)

HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add a deep, pleasing performance sound to your Subie WRX or WRX STI sedan
  • Straight through sound absorbing muffler produces a deep and refined performance sound from idle throughout the RPM range
  • Resist the urge to put your foot in it to keep the RPMs and sound levels lower
  • Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound
  • If deep performance sound that becomes louder as you increase your acceleration fits your desire, this is the system for you

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • Larger exhaust tube reduces weight and exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains
  • Higher exhaust flow prepares for future performance modifications
  • Lighter weight assembly as compared to stock exhaust system improves all aspects of performance
  • Higher exhaust flow and lighter weight improves gas mileage fuel economy
  • Cat-back system eliminates the factory mufflers for added power and weight reduction
  • Longer lengths of increased diameter tube of the cat-back system means even more gas flow and performance improvements than an axle-back system

GET NOTICED:
  • Quad 4-inch double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges add style to your ride
  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the matte black Cerakote finish
  • Great sound and great looks turn heads and get positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Industry exclusive 100% T304 stainless steel straight through mufflers
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Direct bolt-in upgrade requires no cutting or welding to install and eases re-installation of stock exhaust system
  • Single tip rear fascias require trimming for clearance of quad tips (2008 - 2011)
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, and 2014 Subaru WRX and WRX STI sedan
  • No tune required

Products.ProductDescription:
2008 - 2014 3rd Generation Subaru WRX and WRX STI Sedan Drone Management System TM (DMS TM) Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System without Catalytic Converter
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 7 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 10 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)

HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add a deep, pleasing performance sound to your Subie WRX or WRX STI sedan
  • Elimination of factory catalyst increases aggressiveness of exhaust sound and adds louder turbo sound
  • Straight through sound absorbing muffler produces a deep and refined performance sound from idle throughout the RPM range
  • Resist the urge to put your foot in it to keep the RPMs and sound levels lower
  • Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound
  • If deep performance sound that becomes louder as you increase your acceleration fits your desire, this is the system for you
  • MRTs proprietary Drone Management System TM (DMS TM) includes a tuned resonance chamber specific to this particular cat-back performance exhaust system
  • DMS TM actively manages drone levels to increase the comfort of the driver and passengers inside the vehicle and provide a unique performance sound

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • Replaces the factory downpipe and eliminates the catalytic converter with larger 3-inch tubing resulting in the fastest possible turbo spooling
  • Larger diameter exhaust tube eliminates the initial restriction point after the turbo of the stock downpipe allowing exhaust gases to flow at a much more rapid rate
  • Mandrel tube bending provides for the smooth flow of exhaust gases
  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • Larger exhaust tube reduces weight and exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains
  • Higher exhaust flow prepares for future performance modifications
  • Lighter weight assembly as compared to stock exhaust system improves all aspects of performance
  • Larger exhaust tube and lighter weight over stock exhaust system improves gas mileage fuel economy
  • Longer lengths of increased diameter tube of the turbo-back system means even more gas flow and performance improvements than an axle-back system

GET NOTICED:
  • Quad 4-inch double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges add style to your ride
  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the matte black Cerakote finish
  • Great sound and great looks turn heads and get positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Industry exclusive 100% T304 stainless steel straight through mufflers
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Eliminates factory catalyst
  • Single tip rear fascias require trimming for clearance of quad tips (2008 - 2011)
  • Direct bolt-in upgrade requires no cutting or welding to install and eases re-installation of stock exhaust system
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, and 2014 Subaru WRX and WRX STI sedan
  • Off road use only
  • Emissions compliance not warranted; you are responsible to verify local requirements
  • Custom tune recommended; call MRT at (734) 455-5807 for availability

Products.ProductDescription: To keep your car in Showroom condition between washes, FINALE was developed for those of us who like that fresh, clean feel of having the perfect car. Used by Pilots, Flight Attendants and Flight Crews around the globe, FINALE has built a reputation over the years for keeping VIP aircraft in such a state. Water spots, streaks and undesirable dust between washes are a thing of the past once you use FINALE on your automobile. Formulated for both interior and exterior surfaces, FINALE is an imperative step for every regular maintenance detail and in between FINALE allows your car to maintain that shine and luster of a newly waxed car between waxes. Its lubricating agents encapsulate dirt and grime allowing fragile surfaces on your car, such as paint, to be safe from scratches.. Not only does FINALE add a desirable shine and polished look to your car, but it also places a thin, protective barrier between your car and the elements.

Products.ProductDescription: When challenged to clean aircraft with multi-million dollar interiors and return them to looking like they were new, our detail teams at International Aero Services turn to IMMACULATE Interior Cleaner. Unsatisfied with every product we ever tried, we developed IMMACULATE to be the safe and superior cleaner that it is today. Trusted to outperform all other interior cleaners, our own detailers have built their reputations using this amazing product. To ensure that our aerospace clients keep their planes looking their best, we recommend they use this product between every major detail service. Now available to you, IMMACULATE is the secret to how flight crews around the globe keep their VIP aircraft looking brand new. Imagine how IMMACULATE your car's interior will look after using it. Use IMMACULATE on all your interior surfaces to give you that just detailed look. In just minutes, your entire interior will look sharp and smell fresh. Quickly and easily clean and maintain carpet, upholstery, interior plastics, vinyl, leather, rubber, metal and even audio/video equipment. The safe formula cleans, lifts off dust, ashes, dirt, grime, spills and fingerprints. IMMACULATE leaves your interior surfaces looking natural and revitalized.

Products.ProductDescription:
In today's modern aircraft and automobiles, there are many different surfaces, and many of them are made of rubber, vinyl, or plastic. All of these materials tend to dry out and crack as the natural oils (in the case of rubber), or plasterers (in the case of plastics or fiberglass) ; over time. PROTECT was designed to stop this from happening and ensure that your surfaces remain looking as good as new. In addition, unlike other treatments on the market, PROTECT has been designed to penetrate the surface it is applied to. This prevents SLING which occurs when products are applied to tires and then flies off leaving dirt spots all over your freshly cleaned automobile, which means no more dirt spots showing up behind wheel wells or down the side of the automobile.

PROTECT is formulated to recondition a plethora of surfaces.Anything from plastic, fiberglass, vinyl and rubber is a candidate for PROTECT's astounding protection and conditioning. PROTECT also prohibits UV damage and other natural wear and tear from effecting the look and feel of these surfaces.

Products.ProductName: Aero Shine : Dry Wash & Speed Wax 16oz
Products.ProductDescription:
Formulated to remove heavy soil, brake dust and grease found on aircraft safely and effectively, AWAY is an environmentally friendly degreaser. It is a must that our degreaser perform to the very highest quality standards removing all dirt, soil, grease or brake dust from the surface of aircraft, while being gentle on sensitive components and specially treated surfaces. AWAY degreaser will replace a shelf or two of cleaning products in your garage. It works as a bug & tar remover, a wheel cleaner, a tire cleaner and an engine degreaser. AWAY cleaner is powerful enough to cut through grease on engines and baked-on brake dust even on roughcast aluminum wheels. Tar, sap, and bugs will break down in just a matter of seconds. This amazing product was formulated exclusively to clean, maintain and protect the extremely expensive painted surfaces found on private jet aircraft. Designed to withstand the harshest environments found on earth (and above), from a hot tarmac and temperatures that reach to the frigid temperatures found at 50,000 feet above the earth. SHINE was also designed and formulated to withstand the abrasive affects encountered in the atmosphere while flying at over 600 mph. With many airports around the world not allowing wet washing of airplanes, Aero Products developed SHINE in order to deliver the perfect Dry Wash Protectant. SHINE is a revolutionary new method of washing and shining your car and providing a protective coating on your paint in minutes, without water. No buckets, no hoses, no rinsing and drying! Simply spray on the surface and wipe dry. With SHINE you can conveniently and quickly wash your vehicle anywhere, anytime. The unique formulation dissolves dirt and stains such as tree sap and bugs. Special lubricating agents encapsulate the dirt so that it can easily be wiped off a car's delicate surface without scratching. It also leaves a protective film that provides gloss, color enhancement and smoothness that conventional car washes
fail to deliver.

Products.ProductDescription: <inline style="font-size: 16px;">Nothing is more unsightly than major stains or heavy soil marks in your car interior, which make it look aged and worn out. SPOT has been developed over many years, and is the exclusive and trusted stain remover of our own professional detail teams on Corporate, Heads-of State and VIP jets all around the globe. SPOT will allow you to maintain your carpet and fabric upholstery just as owners of VIP aircraft have for years. SPOT allows every driver to have pristine, impeccable carpet and fabric upholstery. Whether using SPOT to treat a large area or a persnickety, set-in stain from juice or stubborn dirt, the results are Spotless. While some carpet and fabric cleaners leave residues that attract dirt for future stains and spots, SPOT does not leave film and will keep the surface looking flawless. SPOT, which is perfect for colorfast carpet and fabric surfaces, is an all natural cleaner making it both biodegradable and perfect for your car.</inline>

Products.ProductDescription: SUDS Exterior Soap has been specially formulated to powerfully clean your car as it protects your wax finish. With harsh chemical and stripping agents, most soap can cause damage to your automobile. Sure they may be easy to use, but along with removing dirt, they also remove your finish and protective coatings. That is why SUDS is the perfect balance of shielding your wax and protective coatings, while also removing unsightly dirt and road grime. SUDS, the ultimate soap that helps to keep a shine on your paint without harsh stripping agents that can damage surfaces, is environmentally friendly and biodegradable. With SUDS you do not have to worry about water spots or causing spider web marks in your paint finish because of its revolutionary lubricating agents to remove the dirt.

Products.ProductDescription: SUPPLE Leather and Vinyl Conditioner was developed to maintain the elite leather seats found on today's private aircraft, and now it is available for your car. Imagine your seats looking and feeling as good as the day you drove your car off the showroom floor. Using SUPPLE will ensure that your leather seats last for the life of your automobile.It is not only the everyday use that causes leather to wear and tear, but using products containing substances such as silicone and waxes that are not specifically designed to condition and protect delicate surfaces similar to leather. When exposed to the elements and everyday traffic, it is essential to replace natural oils into leather interior to prevent deterioration and aging. After completing a routine interior cleaning, apply SUPPLE to all leather surfaces to not only create a barrier of protection, but to bring back its original luster.

Products.ProductName: Aero View : Interior & Exterior Window Cleaner 16 oz.
Products.ProductDescription: Nothing says clean car better than having perfectly clean, streak-free windows and mirrors. At International Aero, when challenged with detailing the world's most exclusive aircraft, we needed nothing less than the perfect window cleaner. Our team invented VIEW, the ultimate glass cleaner. Not only will it remove the thousands of miles of dirt picked up in the atmosphere, but leaves the glass surface clean, clear and streak-free. If it performs this well on jets, just imagine the beautiful results you will receive on your car. VIEW Glass Cleaner is excellent for cleaning all glass surfaces.It quickly dissolves fingerprints, smudges, dust and dirt while leaving glass and mirrors with a brilliant streak-free shine. This fast acting formula does not streak and will not leave any residue making everything on your car from automotive glass to headlights crystal clear. The ammonia-free product is safe, yet powerful enough to remove unsightly dirt and grime.

Products.ProductName: Aero Away : Tire & Engine Cleaner 16 oz.
Products.ProductDescription: <inline style="font-size: 16px;">Formulated to remove heavy soil, brake dust and grease found on aircraft safely and effectively, AWAY is an environmentally friendly degreaser. It is a must that our degreaser perform to the very highest quality standards removing all dirt, soil, grease or brake dust from the surface of aircraft, while being gentle on sensitive components and specially treated surfaces. AWAY degreaser will replace a shelf or two of cleaning products in your garage. It works as a bug & tar remover, a wheel cleaner, a tire cleaner and an engine degreaser. AWAY cleaner is powerful enough to cut through grease on engines and baked-on brake dust even on roughcast aluminum wheels. Tar, sap, and bugs will break down in just a matter of seconds.</inline>
